parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

parameters.name: SemanticVersion
parameters.description: The semantic version of the application: https://semver.org/

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time this resource was created.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time this template expires. Templates expire 1 hour after creation.

nested_items.name: SemanticVersion
nested_items.description: The semantic version of the application:

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the template creation workflow.

nested_items.name: TemplateUrl
nested_items.description: A link to the template that can be used to deploy the application using AWS CloudFormation.
